Text:
I saw that you encode the audio in your Quark releases with AAC-LC, and I'm sure that AAC-HE2 would be much better sounding.
Otherwise, very nice releases.

hi sir:)
welcome back..how r u ?
could you please do white collar season 1.. still waiting for your this top notch encodes :P

Thanks !

@ Dear .. Can you do this when It comes out.. 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1821700/
trailer looks great!

@8ax_: Nope, it is not, that is not the purpose of it. Sound is perfect and perfect things shouldn't be changed. And [quark], as my specific format (quark had mono sound) is dead from 2010.

@critic89: Thank you. So, you haven't seen SU forum list what was lost? Good news is that I re-uploaded pretty much everything what was gone. WC would be released.

@twentyforty : yeah sir i am noticing that, i am in regular touch with your su page (not with su forum though),and i know about about your work lost and still seeding what i have, and was there in that list..

yeah silveroakleaf told me about you,but he said that you are going on vacation  :/ 
no idea about it that u will discontinue on su :(

anyway leave all,good thing is that you are back and its always been blessing to have you back sir..:)
will be in touch :P
